alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:01PM CDT until June 24 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL MONROE AND WESTERN WAPELLO COUNTIES... At 501 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blakesburg, or 9 miles west of Ottumwa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. At 459 PM, quarter size hail was reported near Blakesburg. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Chillicothe around 515 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Ottumwa Industrial Airport and Ottumwa. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
